text: Each query plan operator implements a function. — On each invocation, the operator returns either a single tuple or a null marker if there are no more tuples. — The operator implements a loop that calls next on its children to retrieve their tuples and then process them. Also called Volcano or Pipeline Model. - E £2CMU-DB : ‘ | - ; F — — r e —— =s — — I » Pl 4% 507/1:0537 - ITERATOR MODEL > T @ e IO 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
